job_tasks.phrase: funger als senior door zowel zelf te coderen als het team te coachen op technische aspecten. De focus ligt op het ontwikkelen van end-to-end webapplicaties met behulp van Python en Django. Het schrijven van efficiënte, onderhoudsvriendelijke en schaalbare code voor verschillende applicaties van het platform behoren tot je takenpakket;
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes traditional software development tasks like coding, coaching, developing end-to-end web applications, and writing efficient, maintainable, and scalable code, which aligns with the definition of Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: werk je nauw samen met data scientist en data engineers om LLM's te integreren zodat het platform optimaal functioneert en presteert;
job_tasks.justification: This phrase involves integrating LLMs into a platform, which is a core aspect of integrating AI/ML features into software applications, fitting the Software Development & Integration category.

job_tasks.phrase: uitvoeren van code-reviews, het geven van constructieve feedback om onze 'coding standards' en 'best practices' te blijven hanteren;
job_tasks.justification: Code reviews and maintaining coding standards are fundamental software engineering practices, aligning with Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Werk je nauw samen met je stakeholders om de behoeftes te begrijpen, technische oplossingen te adviseren en hoogwaardige softwareproducten op tijd en binnen het budget te leveren.
job_tasks.justification: This describes working with stakeholders to understand needs, advise on technical solutions, and deliver software products, which falls under the umbrella of software development and project delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bent op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen op het gebied van GenAI, LLM en softwareontwikkeling zodat je instaat bent om met nieuwe inzichten en aanbevelingen te komen ter optimalisatie van onze producten;
job_tasks.justification: Being aware of GenAI and LLM developments and providing insights for product optimization implies understanding and potentially working with model capabilities, which aligns with Model Development & Fine-Tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Het Technology & Innovation-team binnen de bedrijfstak Financial Advisory van Deloitte richt zich (o.a.) op het helpen van andere teams bij het gebruik en implementatie van de nieuwste technologieën.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the team's focus on helping other business units use and implement new technologies, indicating an understanding of business needs and strategic alignment.

profile.rationale: The job ad heavily emphasizes traditional software development tasks (coding, web applications, Python, Django, code reviews, stakeholder management) which fall under Macro-Category A (1.A.1). While it mentions integrating LLMs and staying updated on GenAI/LLM developments (1.B.1), the core focus remains on building and integrating these into a platform as a software engineer. The role involves significant software engineering with AI/ML as a component, rather than deep specialization in model development or GenAI tasks. Therefore, 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' is the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is clear about the core responsibilities being software development, with specific mentions of technologies like Python and Django. The integration of LLMs is stated as a collaborative effort with data scientists, reinforcing the software engineering focus. The language is direct and outlines typical senior developer tasks, making the classification straightforward.
